titles.title: Military Access to Housing Act of 2007

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude amounts received as a military basic housing allowance from consideration as income for purposes of the low-income housing credit and qualified residential rental projects.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/12/2007--Introduced. Military Access to Housing Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude military basic housing allowances from income for purposes of establishing eligibility for housing in qualified residential rental projects.
